snippet.title: Morbid Metal - Early Development Teaser 2
snippet.description:
Follow me on Twitter for daily updates ~ https://twitter.com/PHO3LIX_ 
Morbid Metal is a 3rd person, dark sci-fi, action roguelite, where you can shapeshift into unique characters to unleash powerful combos! I am currently solo developing this project with the Unity Engine!

Reddit ~ https://www.reddit.com/r/MorbidMetal/

This video is a Teaser of whats to come very soon! The game is still relatively early in development, but I would like to share the process with the community in order to create a better game!

Please ask as many questions as you like and leave feedback! Visit my Twitter page for more content and information about the project!

Music:
Descent - Scott Buckley
https://www.scottbuckley.com.au/library/descent/
